import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Link,NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import "./Navbar.css"; const Navbar = () => { const[menuOpen,setMenuOpen]=useState(false); return
setMenuOpen(!menuOpen)}>

} export default Navbar
